entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
